EN: Xiaoxiao Chun Piano Bar, you can sing with the pianist

The atmosphere is elegant but luxurious, comfortable seats, which makes people not tired for a long time. The teacher plays the piano on the spot, and will also intersperse other instruments such as guitar. It is really the best place for friends to sing a drink.
Very simple and warm place, drink small wine, sing, and make friends.I have been here at least 50 times, and I have to come again.
